Miramar.Lake Lucerne, Florida:
Lake Lucerne is a neighborhood in Miami Gardens, Florida, United States The population was 9,132 at the 2000 census.


== Geography ==
Lake Lucerne is located at 25°57′56″N 80°15′14″W (25.965420, -80.253858).
According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP has a total area of 6.8 km² (2.6 mi²).
